Create a New User for Your Organization

Use this task to create user accounts so they can be authenticated by the PW EMS.

  1. Click the Navigation Bar menu and select Administration > RBAC.
  2. Select the appropriate organization from the drop down list at the top of the Managing Organization window.
  3. In the Managing Organization window, select the USERS tab and click CREATE NEW USER FOR: <Organization>.
  4. In the Create New User for:<Organization> dialog box complete the following fields:

    Field

    Description
    Specify User Name

    Use the following rules to enter the user name:

    NOTE: The following user name rules are enforced by the PW EMS.
    • One or more lower-case characters.
    • One or more upper-case characters.
    • One or more numerical characters.
    • One or more of the following comma-separated special characters: space, @, _ (underscore), and - (dash). A user name with an @ symbol is commonly used in LDAP configurations. For example: SystemUser1@myorg
    • There is a minimum of 8 characters and a maximum of 64 characters.
    User Password Enter the user password using the following rules:
    NOTE: The following password rules are enforced by the PW EMS.
    • This new password must be different from the default password.
    • There is at least one lower case letter.
    • There is at least one upper case letter.
    • There is at least one numeric character.
    • There is at least one special character from the list: ! @ # % _ & $ ^ * ? : ; ~ = ` |
    • There is a minimum of 8 characters expected in the password.
    • There is a maximum of 16 characters expected in the password
    Confirm User Password

    Reenter the new user password that you entered.
    Password Authentication Policy: drop-down list

    (Not configurable) The Simplistic Passwords Authorization authentication policy appears.
    Change Password Expiration Days: The number of days allowed before the user is required to update their password or their account becomes inaccessible.
    User Email: The user email address for their organization.
    Change Session Timeout: The number of minutes that the user session can remain idle before the session expires and the system logs this user out of the system.
  5. Click CREATE THE ROLE. The organization displays in the Organizations tab.
Parent topic: Configure PW EMS Role-Based Access
